query: ALTER TABLE resource ADD CONSTRAINT resource_pk PRIMARY KEY(id), ADD CONSTRAINT resource_fk_resource_type_id FOREIGN KEY(resource_type_id) REFERENCES resource_type(id), ADD CONSTRAINT resource_fk_owner_id FOREIGN KEY(owner_id) REFERENCES workspace(id) DEFERRABLE INITIALLY IMMEDIATE, ADD CONSTRAINT resource_uq_id_owner_id UNIQUE(id, owner_id);
